org.simplity.kernel.comp

Class ComponentManager<T extends Component>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simplity.kernel.comp.ComponentManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - this is internally used by this class. Users never deal with an instance of this.

    public class ComponentManager<T extends Component>
extends Object
    class that knows where resources persist and how to get a stream to read them We are still debating whether we are better-off writing individual classes rather than this parameterized utility class
    Author:
    simplity.org
